body_content.explanation: a person who takes part in a video conference (= a meeting at which two or more people who are in different places can talk to and see each other using electronic technology) to which they have not been invited, often with the intention of interrupting and annoying the people in the meeting:
examples: Zoom allows hosts to suspend meetings, eject the Zoombomber, and alert high-risk sessions.
Sometimes, despite you taking every precaution, a stealthy Zoom bomber sneaks in.
